person.persName: George L. Lovier (Christian County, Kentucky apprentice silver smith and soldier)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, apprentice silver smith and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Richard Lovier and Elizabeth Lovier. Resident of Christian County, Kentucky in 1850. Apprentice silver smith in Christian County in 1860. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.) as private from October 20, 1861 to June 1, 1863. Served in the 48th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant from June 1, 1863 to December 17, 1864.
